function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global cooperation not comprehensive due to government reluctance or lack of resources","Impact":"Limited ability to gather and share WBE data, hindering disease monitoring and research","Mitigation":"Advocate for transparency and resource allocation, incentivize participation in global initiatives","Technologies":"Data sharing platforms, incentivization mechanisms","People":"Governments, public health agencies, research institutions","Owner":"International health organizations, advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Lack of centralized clearing house for WBE data and knowledge","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying knowns, research needs, and gaps in WBE data, hindering comprehensive research strategy development","Mitigation":"Establish a centralized clearing house for WBE data with continuous updates and collaboration","Technologies":"Knowledge management systems, collaborative platforms","People":"Researchers, public health experts, policymakers","Owner":"International health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Reluctance to publicize WBE data by some governments","Impact":"Inhibits public awareness and preparedness, hinders global collaboration in disease monitoring","Mitigation":"Diplomatic negotiations, awareness campaigns, support for resource-limited governments","Technologies":"Public education platforms, diplomatic communication tools","People":"Government officials, public health agencies, advocacy groups","Owner":"International health organizations, diplomatic entities"}]}
